TensorCApi::MakeTensor doesn't seem visible from client code today. However, you can probably avoid copying pre-allocated buffers to tensors with a customized Alocator.

class FakeAllocator {
 public:
  FakeAllocator(void* buffer): buffer_(buffer) {}
  void* AllocateRaw(size_t alignment, size_t num_bytes) override { return buffer_; }
  void DeallocateRaw(void*) override {}

 private:
  void* buffer_ = nullptr;
};
